data.name: Zombie Army 4: Flags Charm Pack
data.detailed_description:
Let the undead know who sent you! With these flag charms, you can add some patriotic spirit to your guns!
This Charms Pack contains the following flags;
• British
• American
• French
• German
• Italian
• Spanish
• Russian
• Canadian
• Japanese
• South Korean
• Chinese
data.about_the_game:
Let the undead know who sent you! With these flag charms, you can add some patriotic spirit to your guns!
This Charms Pack contains the following flags;

• German
• Italian
• Spanish
• Russian
• Canadian

data.short_description: Let the undead know who sent you! With these flag charms, you can add some patriotic spirit to your guns!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
